attributes.action: Take Action to Stop the Execution of Kenny Richey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kenny Richey has spent more than 20 years on Death Row in Ohio USA; despite new evidence being presented to the court in 1997 which establishes that Kenny Richey is an innocent man.  
Please sign this petiton to ask the Government to take action to stop Kenny Richey being executed in Ohio, USA.

Amnesty International has been campaigning to free this man, and I would urge you to sign this petition and register your objection.
